attributes.action: Exempt the existing overseas health workers from the NHS fee.
attributes.additional_details:
These people, many of whom are in the lower pay quartile, have continued to work for the benefit of the nation as a whole in treating, caring and making premices safe.
As a gesture and to recognise this sacrifice, retracting the NHS fee for these people would show that we value their contribution in tackling this pandemic.
attributes.background: Introduce a Bill or Emergency Measure (whichever is appropriate) to stop the NHS fee to existing NHS, care workers and other affiliated workers (eg contract cleaners.)
